intro:
A digital artbook featuring a wide variety including artwork of the game by Taiki (Character Design) and Isamu Kamikokuryo (Concept Art), field area backgrounds and weapon graphics.
Many pieces of exclusive concept art from the development stages of the attractive and unique characters are also included. Furthermore, concept art that dynamically and vibrantly expresses the unique world based on medieval fantasy is a must-see.

※There is a bundle that contains this product. Please be careful about making duplicate purchases.
